ing: 2 (6 ounce) cans crabmeat, drained and flaked
des: "These little appetizers are perfect for a fancy dinner party or if you're trying to clean out your refrigerator....Kids love them too!!!"
ins: Spread each cucumber slice with cream cheese, layer with crabmeat, and top with cocktail sauce. Place in the refrigerator to chill, or serve right away.
